'''Bag End''' is the third track of disc one of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. The lyrics are based on the poem [[The Road Goes Ever On (song)#The Lord of the Rings|The Road Goes Ever On]] from ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''

==Lyrics==
<poem>
[0:04 - 0:38]
(humming)
Down from the door where it began.
(humming)
And I must follow, if I can,

The Road goes ever on and on
Down from the door where it began.
Now far ahead the Road has gone,
And I must follow, if I can,
</poem>
